Paper.Title: Semi-Automatic Generation of Dialogue Applications in the GEMINI Project [?]

Section.Paragraph: gual Interactive Natural Interfaces) is an EC funded research project, which has two main objectives: First, the development of a flexible platform able to produce user-friendly interactive multilingual and multi-modal dialogue interfaces to databases with a minimum of human effort, and, second, the demonstration of the platform's efficiency through the development of two different applications based on this platform: EG-Banking, a voice-portal for high-quality interactions for bank customers, and CitizenCare, an e-government platform framework for citizen-to-administration interaction which are available for spoken and web-based user interaction.
